mapper.select: SELECT o.id AS object_id, o.name AS object_name, o.path AS object_path, o.type AS object_type, o.location AS location, o.category_id AS category_id, c.name AS category_name, tp.code AS tenant_permission_code FROM feature_objects o LEFT JOIN feature_object_categories c ON o.category_id = c.id INNER JOIN tenant_feature_permissions tfe ON tfe.object_id = o.id AND tfe.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND tfe.status = 1 INNER JOIN permissions tp ON tp.id = tfe.permission_id WHERE o.status = 1 ORDER BY o.sort ASC, o.id ASC

SELECT o.id AS object_id, o.name AS object_name, o.path AS object_path, o.type AS object_type, o.location AS location, o.category_id AS category_id, c.name AS category_name, tp.code AS tenant_permission_code, CASE rp.permission_level WHEN 2 THEN 'ADMIN' WHEN 1 THEN 'READ' ELSE 'DISABLE' END AS permission_code FROM feature_objects o LEFT JOIN feature_object_categories c ON o.category_id = c.id INNER JOIN tenant_feature_permissions tfe ON tfe.object_id = o.id AND tfe.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND tfe.status = 1 INNER JOIN permissions tp ON tp.id = tfe.permission_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT rp.object_id, MAX(CASE p.code WHEN 'ADMIN' THEN 2 WHEN 'READ' THEN 1 WHEN 'DISABLE' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END) AS permission_level FROM role_permissions rp INNER JOIN permissions p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND rp.tenant_id = #{tenantId} GROUP BY rp.object_id ) rp ON rp.object_id = o.id WHERE o.status = 1 ORDER BY o.sort ASC, o.id ASC

SELECT o.id AS object_id, o.name AS object_name, o.path AS object_path, o.type AS object_type, o.location AS location, o.category_id AS category_id, c.name AS category_name, tp.code AS tenant_permission_code, CASE rp.permission_level WHEN 2 THEN 'ADMIN' WHEN 1 THEN 'READ' ELSE 'DISABLE' END AS permission_code FROM feature_objects o LEFT JOIN feature_object_categories c ON o.category_id = c.id INNER JOIN tenant_feature_permissions tfe ON tfe.object_id = o.id AND tfe.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND tfe.status = 1 INNER JOIN permissions tp ON tp.id = tfe.permission_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT rp.object_id, MAX(CASE p.code WHEN 'ADMIN' THEN 2 WHEN 'READ' THEN 1 WHEN 'DISABLE' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END) AS permission_level FROM role_permissions rp INNER JOIN permissions p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND rp.tenant_id = #{tenantId} GROUP BY rp.object_id ) rp ON rp.object_id = o.id WHERE o.status = 1 ORDER BY o.sort ASC, o.id ASC

SELECT rp.object_id AS object_id, r.id AS role_id, r.name AS role_name, CASE MAX(CASE p.code WHEN 'ADMIN' THEN 2 WHEN 'READ' THEN 1 WHEN 'DISABLE' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END) WHEN 2 THEN 'ADMIN' WHEN 1 THEN 'READ' ELSE 'DISABLE' END AS permission_code FROM role_permissions rp INNER JOIN permissions p ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN roles r ON r.id = rp.role_id INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND ur.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND rp.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND r.tenant_id = #{tenantId} GROUP BY rp.object_id, r.id, r.name

SELECT DISTINCT o.*, c.name AS category_name FROM feature_objects o LEFT JOIN feature_object_categories c ON o.category_id = c.id INNER JOIN tenant_feature_permissions tfe ON tfe.object_id = o.id AND tfe.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND tfe.status = 1 WHERE o.type = 'MENU' AND o.status = 1 AND (#{location} IS NULL OR #{location} = '' OR o.location = #{location}) AND o.id IN ( SELECT rp.object_id FROM role_permissions rp INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND ur.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND rp.tenant_id = #{tenantId} ) ORDER BY o.sort ASC, o.id ASC

SELECT o.*, c.name AS category_name FROM feature_objects o LEFT JOIN feature_object_categories c ON o.category_id = c.id INNER JOIN tenant_feature_permissions tfe ON tfe.object_id = o.id AND tfe.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND tfe.status = 1 WHERE o.type = 'MENU' AND o.status = 1 ORDER BY o.sort ASC, o.id ASC

SELECT o.id AS object_id, o.name AS object_name, o.path AS object_path, o.type AS object_type, o.location AS location, o.category_id AS category_id, c.name AS category_name, o.sort AS sort, o.status AS object_status, tfe.status AS entitlement_status, p.id AS permission_id, p.code AS permission_code, p.level AS permission_level FROM feature_objects o LEFT JOIN feature_object_categories c ON o.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN tenant_feature_permissions tfe ON tfe.object_id = o.id AND tfe.tenant_id = #{tenantId} LEFT JOIN permissions p ON p.id = tfe.permission_id WHERE o.status = 1 ORDER BY o.sort ASC, o.id ASC

SELECT o.id AS object_id, o.name AS object_name, o.path AS object_path, o.type AS object_type, o.location AS location, o.category_id AS category_id, c.name AS category_name, o.sort AS sort, o.status AS object_status, tfe.status AS entitlement_status, p.id AS permission_id, p.code AS permission_code, p.level AS permission_level FROM feature_objects o LEFT JOIN feature_object_categories c ON o.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN tenant_feature_permissions tfe ON tfe.object_id = o.id AND tfe.tenant_id = #{tenantId} LEFT JOIN permissions p ON p.id = tfe.permission_id WHERE o.id = #{objectId} AND o.status = 1 LIMIT 1
